channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to use the Amex Platinum $200 airline fee credit in 2026
item.description: If you have the Amex Platinum, Business Platinum or Hilton Amex Aspire, take advantage of the airline fee credit. Here are tips for maximizing this pe...

item.title: Book with points at these 10 wellness-centric hotels for an active start to 2026
item.description: From Bali and Rome to Costa Rica and Colorado, these properties have a lot to offer those in search of a movement-focused vacation.

item.title: 10 truly special luxury hotels and resorts you can book with points
item.description: Some stays are more than just great â€” they're over-the-top amazing. Here's a look at 10 of the most aspirational hotels you can book with points.

item.title: Extra credit: How to pay college tuition with a credit card
item.description: When does it makes sense to incur a fee to use a credit card for tuition payments? Here are all the details on paying college tuition with a credit ca...

item.title: UPDATE: Caribbean, San Juan flights resume Sunday after mass cancellations
item.description: Airlines have resumed air service to andd from Puerto Rico and the Caribbean on Sunday after the U.S. military operation in Venezuela.
